  * The planned expansion of the IceCube observatory at the South Pole marks a new era in neutrino astronomy.


  * The International Helmholtz-Weizmann Research School on Multimessenger Astronomy provides a world-class international training and education environment. We accept applications from Oct 6 to Nov 7, 2025.
